tool_description:
An API for getting the locations in the Philippines based on data from the Philippine Standard Geographic Code published by the Philippine Statistics Authority. The location data is updated quarterly.

Free tier includes 30 free requests per month.
name: PH Locations API
title: PH Locations API

api_list.name: /get_cities_municipalities
/autocomplete_barangays
/autocomplete_provinces
/autocomplete_regions
/get_provinces
/get_cities
/health_check
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ph-locations-api1.p.rapidapi.com/health_check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ph-locations-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
